document_data.Nature: According to Deneiran doctrine, the ''Metatext'' manifested in the [[Prime Material plane|mortal realms]] in every text or written document that was ever produced.
document_data.Powers: It was believed that by reading the ''Metatext'', a mortal individual could ascend to godhood.
